thread.title: ESPN is cutting about 300 jobs, or 4 percent of staff
thread.title_full: ESPN is cutting about 300 jobs, or 4 percent of staff

title: ESPN is cutting about 300 jobs, or 4 percent of staff
text: > Top News ESPN is cutting about 300 jobs, or 4 percent of staff FILE - This Sept. 16, 2013 file photo shows the ESPN logo prior to an NFL football game between the Cincinnati Bengals and the Pittsburgh Steelers, in Cincinnati. ESPN. Disney's ESPN on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015 confirmed it is cutting about 300 jobs, or 4 percent of its staff, amid signs that the traditional cable bundle is less far-reaching than it once was. (AP Photo/David Kohl, File)
